newsitem.title: HONG KONG: St Denis raises offer for Hop Ying shares.
newsitem.headline: St Denis raises offer for Hop Ying shares.

text.p: St Denis Ltd has revised up the offer price for shares of Hop Ying International Holdings Ltd to HK$0.83 in cash, the companies said in a joint statement on Tuesday.
The statement, which gave no details on the revision, said the cash offer was expected to be completed on October 10.

In May, St Denis said it would be required to make a general offer to Hop Ying shareholders at not less than HK$0.82 per share on completion of its purchase of a controlling stake in Hop Ying and an injection of assets into the company.
St Denis is 90 percent owned by businessmen Vincent Wong and 10 percent by Peng Xiong Fa.
Hop Ying shares were unchanged at HK$0.87 at midday.
